trans-unit.source: Provides information about network interfaces that support Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) or Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6).
trans-unit.target: 提供支援網際網路通訊協定第 4 版 (IPv4) 或網際網路通訊協定第 6 版 (IPv6) 的網路介面相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This class provides access to configuration and address information for network interfaces that support IPv4 or IPv6.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會提供存取支援 IPv4 或 IPv6 網路介面的組態和位址資訊。

trans-unit.source: You do not create instances of this class; they are returned by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.GetIPProperties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您不會建立此類別; 事件類別的執行個體所傳回<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.GetIPProperties%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To access IPv4-specific properties, use the object returned by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceProperties.GetIPv4Properties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取 IPv4 專用的屬性，使用所傳回的物件<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceProperties.GetIPv4Properties%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To access IPv6-specific properties, use the object returned by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceProperties.GetIPv6Properties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取 IPv6 特有的屬性，使用所傳回的物件<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceProperties.GetIPv6Properties%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays address information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示位址資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceProperties" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceProperties" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be called only from classes that derive from <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceProperties>.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式可以呼叫只能從衍生自的<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceProperties>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the anycast IP addresses assigned to this interface.
trans-unit.target: 取得指派給這個介面的任一傳播 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressInformationCollection" /> that contains the anycast addresses for this interface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressInformationCollection" />，包含這個介面的任一傳播位址。

trans-unit.source: An anycast address identifies multiple computers.
trans-unit.target: 任一傳播位址識別多部電腦。

trans-unit.source: Packets sent to an anycast address are sent to one of the computers identified by the address.
trans-unit.target: 傳送至任一傳播位址的封包傳送至該位址所識別之電腦的其中一個。

trans-unit.source: Anycast addressing is an IPv6 feature used to update router tables for a group of hosts.
trans-unit.target: 任一傳播位址是 IPv6 功能用來更新路由表的主機群組。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the anycast addresses for the network interfaces on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示本機電腦上的網路介面的任一傳播位址。

trans-unit.source: Gets the addresses of Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) servers for this interface.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個介面的動態主機設定通訊協定 (DHCP) 伺服器位址。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressCollection" /> that contains the address information for DHCP servers, or an empty array if no servers are found.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressCollection" />，包含 DHCP 伺服器的位址資訊，但如果找不到任何伺服器則為空陣列。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) allows a computer to obtain a network address from a DHCP server, as opposed to using a static (fixed) network address.
trans-unit.target: 動態主機設定通訊協定 (DHCP) 可讓電腦從 DHCP 伺服器，而不是使用靜態 （固定） 網路位址取得網路位址。

trans-unit.source: A DHCP server does not permanently assign addresses; instead, it temporarily uses one of a number of available addresses to the computer.
trans-unit.target: DHCP 伺服器不會永久指派位址。相反地，它暫時會使用其中一個可用的位址到電腦的數字。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the DHCP address information for the network interfaces on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示在本機電腦上的網路介面的 DHCP 位址資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the addresses of Domain Name System (DNS) servers for this interface.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個介面的網域名稱系統 (DNS) 伺服器位址。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressCollection" /> that contains the DNS server addresses.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressCollection" />，包含 DNS 伺服器位址。

trans-unit.source: DNS is a hierarchical naming system used to map host names to IP addresses.
trans-unit.target: DNS 是用來對應至 IP 位址的主機名稱的階層式命名系統。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the DNS addresses for the network interfaces on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示本機電腦上的網路介面的 DNS 位址。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Domain Name System (DNS) suffix associated with this interface.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個介面關聯的網域名稱系統 (DNS) 尾碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the DNS suffix for this interface, or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> if there is no DNS suffix for the interface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含這個介面的 DNS 尾碼，但如果介面沒有 DNS 尾碼則為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The DNS suffix identifies the domain name (for example, "contoso.com") that is appended to an unqualified host name to obtain a fully qualified domain name (FQDN) suitable for a DNS name query.
trans-unit.target: DNS 尾碼識別附加至以取得完整的網域名稱 (FQDN) 適用於 DNS 名稱查詢的不合格的主機名稱的網域名稱 (例如，"contoso.com")。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the local machine has "contoso.com" as its <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceProperties.DnsSuffix%2A>, and must resolve the unqualified host name "www", the FQDN to query is "www.contoso.com".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果本機電腦具有"contoso.com"做為其<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceProperties.DnsSuffix%2A>，而且必須解析不合格的主機名稱"www"，查詢的 FQDN 會是"www.contoso.com"。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the DNS suffix.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示的 DNS 尾碼。

trans-unit.source: This property is not valid on computers running operating systems earlier than Windows 2000.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不適用於執行 Windows 2000 (含) 以前版本作業系統的電腦。

trans-unit.source: Gets the IPv4 network gateway addresses for this interface.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個介面的 IPv4 網路閘道位址。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.GatewayIPAddressInformationCollection" /> that contains the address information for network gateways, or an empty array if no gateways are found.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.GatewayIPAddressInformationCollection" />，包含網路閘道的位址資訊，但如果找不到任何閘道則為空陣列。

trans-unit.source: Gateways that implement the Internet Protocol Version 4 (IPv4) to forward packets between networks are returned by this property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回實作 Internet Protocol Version 4 (IPv4) 網路間轉送封包的閘道。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the gateway addresses for the network interfaces on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示本機電腦上的網路介面閘道位址。

trans-unit.source: Provides Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) configuration data for this network interface.
trans-unit.target: 提供這個網路介面的網際網路通訊協定第 4 版 (IPv4) 組態資料。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceProperties" /> object that contains IPv4 configuration data, or <see langword="null" /> if no data is available for the interface.
trans-unit.target: 包含 IPv4 組態資料的 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceProperties" /> 物件，但如果介面沒有可用的資料則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `null` for <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterfaceType.Loopback> interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回`null`如<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterfaceType.Loopback>介面。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of the information available for an interface that supports IPv4, see the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceProperties> class documentation.
trans-unit.target: 可用的介面，支援 IPv4 的資訊的詳細說明，請參閱<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceProperties>類別文件。

trans-unit.source: Note that the object returned by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceProperties.GetIPv4Properties%2A> method reflects the configuration as of the time the object is created.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，所傳回的物件<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceProperties.GetIPv4Properties%2A>方法會反映物件建立時間為準的組態。

trans-unit.source: This information is not updated dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 這項資訊不會動態更新。

trans-unit.source: The interface does not support the IPv4 protocol.
trans-unit.target: 介面不支援 IPv4 通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: Provides Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6) configuration data for this network interface.
trans-unit.target: 提供這個網路介面的網際網路通訊協定第 6 版 (IPv6) 組態資料。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv6InterfaceProperties" /> object that contains IPv6 configuration data.
trans-unit.target: 包含 IPv6 組態資料的 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv6InterfaceProperties" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of the information available for an interface that supports IPv6, see the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv6InterfaceProperties> documentation.
trans-unit.target: 可用的介面，支援 IPv6 的資訊的詳細說明，請參閱<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv6InterfaceProperties>文件。

trans-unit.source: Note that the object returned by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceProperties.GetIPv6Properties%2A> method reflects the configuration as of the time the object is created.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，所傳回的物件<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceProperties.GetIPv6Properties%2A>方法會反映物件建立時間為準的組態。

trans-unit.source: This information is not updated dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 這項資訊不會動態更新。

trans-unit.source: The interface does not support the IPv6 protocol.
trans-unit.target: 介面不支援 IPv6 通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether NetBt is configured to use DNS name resolution on this interface.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指出是否已將 NetBt 為使用 DNS 名稱解析。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if NetBt is configured to use DNS name resolution on this interface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個介面上的 NetBt 設定為使用 DNS 名稱解析則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: DNS is a hierarchical naming system used to map host names to IP addresses.
trans-unit.target: DNS 是用來對應至 IP 位址的主機名稱的階層式命名系統。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether this interface is configured to automatically register its IP address information with the Domain Name System (DNS).
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指出這個介面是否設定成自動向網域名稱系統 (DNS) 註冊其 IP 位址資訊。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this interface is configured to automatically register a mapping between its dynamic IP address and static domain names; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個介面已經設定成自動註冊其動態 IP 位址與靜態網域名稱之間的對應，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic DNS enables a client to inform the DNS servers that its dynamic IP address is mapped to its static host name.
trans-unit.target: 動態 DNS 可讓用戶端通知的 DNS 伺服器，其動態 IP 位址會對應至靜態的主機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the multicast addresses assigned to this interface.
trans-unit.target: 取得指派給這個介面的多點傳送位址。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.MulticastIPAddressInformationCollection" /> that contains the multicast addresses for this interface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.MulticastIPAddressInformationCollection" />，包含這個介面的多點傳送位址。

trans-unit.source: A multicast address identifies multiple computers.
trans-unit.target: 多點傳送的位址識別多部電腦。

trans-unit.source: Packets sent to a multicast address are sent to all computers identified by the address.
trans-unit.target: 傳送多點傳送位址的封包傳送至該位址所識別的所有電腦。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the multicast addresses for the network interfaces on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示在本機電腦上的網路介面的多點傳送的位址。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unicast addresses assigned to this interface.
trans-unit.target: 取得指派給這個介面的單點傳送位址。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.UnicastIPAddressInformationCollection" /> that contains the unicast addresses for this interface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.UnicastIPAddressInformationCollection" />，包含這個介面的單點傳送位址。

trans-unit.source: A unicast address identifies a single computer.
trans-unit.target: 單點傳播位址識別單一的電腦。

trans-unit.source: Packets sent to a unicast address are sent to the computer identified by the address.
trans-unit.target: 傳送至單點傳播位址的封包傳送至該位址所識別的電腦。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the unicast addresses for the network interfaces on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示本機電腦上的網路介面的單點傳播位址。

trans-unit.source: Gets the addresses of Windows Internet Name Service (WINS) servers.
trans-unit.target: 取得 Windows 網際網路名稱服務 (WINS) 伺服器的位址。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressCollection" /> that contains the address information for WINS servers, or an empty array if no servers are found.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressCollection" />，包含 WINS 伺服器的位址資訊，但如果找不到任何伺服器則為空陣列。

trans-unit.source: WINS provides a distributed database for registering and querying dynamic NetBIOS names to IP address mappings.
trans-unit.target: WINS 提供分散式的資料庫，用以登錄及查詢 IP 位址對應到動態 NetBIOS 名稱。
